messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Lauryn Straub. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Abstain from being kind, do not give other crew members anything.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: You guys are nearing orbit around Clown Planet. We've scheduled a very important diplomat to come aboard and speak with the Captain. We've taken the liberty of ordering special diplomatic clothes.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Lauryn Straub. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of energy draining parasites have swarmed into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Clown Diplomat hasn't checked in for a while, is he okay?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Foos Dae Gamma. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Foos Dae Gamma have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Teleporter Room.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Hello? What has happened to our agent? Did the mimes get him?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Clown Planet has suddenly gone dark. What is the reason for this?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Vacant Office B.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Foos Dae Gamma. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a number of rodents have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Emporer Honk IV
messages.body: You've done a horrible deed. Be prepared for retribution.

comments.author: Lauryn Straub (Captain)
comments.body: he commit suicide, there is nothing i could've done to stop it
